multipleCounsilChairman.name: Lion Arjun Abeysinghe PMJF
multipleCounsilChairman.description: Lion Arjun a Charter Member of Lions Club of Dampe began his lionstic career in year 2006 and was the Club President in 2007/2008 Golden Jubilee Year. He was first invited to the District Cabinet in year 2007/2008. He has held number of cabinet positions including District Chairperson, Zone Chairperson, twice as the Cabinet Treasurer and as the Cabinet Secretary. In year 2012/2013 he was elected as the 2 nd Vice District Governor and in year 2013/2014 as the 1 st Vice District Governor. In the lionistic year 2014/2015 he was elected as the District Governor of Lions District 306 A2 and he became the youngest ever District Governor in Sri Lanka. At Present he savers the Chairperson of the Leadership Institute of District 306 A2. At the last Multiple District Convention of Multiple District 306 Lion Arjun was elected as the Council Chairperson for the lionistic year 2019/2020. Lion Arjun is the first ever lion in district 306 A2 to become a Progressive Melvin Johns Fellow (PMJF) and to be graduated from the Senior Lions Leadership Institute. He has also been graduated from the Lions Faculty Development Institute. He has extended 2 new Lions Clubs for the District. He has received number of awards and certificates including The International Presidents Medal, 10 International Presidents Apprehension Certificates and 2 Leadership Medals and also the 100% Club President Award and the District Governor Excellence award. In 2011/2012 lionistic year he won the “Lion of the Year” Award. He is a proud product of Royal College, Colombo and he completed his higher education at Ceylon Hotel School. Currently he serves as the Chairman/C E O of Winsgreat and Winstech International. He is married to Lion Nayomi Abeysinghe an old girl of Anula Vidyalaya, Nugegoda and she currently serves as a Directress of Winstech International. He is blessed with two daughters namely is Ashnika and Sasindi and both of them are students of Lyceum International School Nugegoda.

districtGovernor.name: Lion Ajith Liyanage MJF
districtGovernor.description:
Lion Ajith Liyanage MJF stepped into the Lions Movement in the year 2002 by joining the Lions Club of Piliyandala. He was the Club Secretary in the years 2003/2004, 2005/2006, and moved on to be the Club President in the Lionistic Year 2006/2007. He entered the Lions District Cabinet as a Zone Chairperson in 2007/2008, Region Chairperson in 2008/2009, moving on to be the Deputy Cabinet Treasurer for five years from 2009 to 2015, LCIF Coordinator for two years from 2014 to 2016, Deputy Cabinet Secretary 2016/2017, Cabinet Secretary in the year 2017/2018, Second Vice District Governor in the year 2018/2019, and First Vice District Governor in the year 2019/2020.

This special Lion Leader has received Appreciation certificates from 8 International Presidents and medals from the International for introducing 4 new clubs. He was awarded Best Secretary at the Lions District Convention 2005/2006 and 100% Appreciation Certificates in 2006/2007. He has taken part in Lions International Conventions in 2008 in Bangkok, Thailand, and 2019 in Milan, Italy.

Lion Ajith Liyanage MJF is an old boy of Ananda College Colombo. By profession, he is the proprietor at Business Consultancy Service and Director at KCS Logistics & Shipping (Pvt) Ltd.

His gracious Lion Lady, Lion Sriyani Liyanage is the Proprietor of Sirikroo Beauty Salon and holds a Diploma in Beauty Culture and Hairdressing from an awarding body in London. She too is a member of the Lions Club of Piliyandala and has been a member of the Lions District Ladies Committee since 2007 and served as the Secretary of the Committee in 2017/2018. They are blessed with two children. Daughter Duloshini Liyanage who is a Past Leo Club President of the Leo Club of Piliyandala for the Leoistic year 2007/2008 and holds a Bachelor of Science (Special) Business Administration. By profession, she is an accountant and happily married spouse Mr. Praveen. His son, Waruna Liyanage who was also a member of the Leo Club of Piliyandala and a District Council Member, holds a Bachelor of Science Degree from CINEC Maritime campus and is currently working at Nord Shipping Co. in Germany.

districtPresident.name: Leo Mudith Jayasekara
districtPresident.description: As a charismatic person with a humble persona, Leo Mudith Jayasekara is now the guiding figure of Leo District 306 A2 for the Leoistic year 2019/2020. Being the symbol of resilience, he is, as can been seen throughout his Leo career, he will prove to be another beacon of light to escort A2 to greater heights. Leoistic Career Being introduced into the Leo movement in 2012 as a club member of Leo Club of Polgasowita, he first functioned in the club board in the year 2013-14. He was fortunate to become the Club President of the Leo Club of Polgasowita in the year 2015-2016 and under his guidance lead them towards a successful leoistic year. He then, was a part of the District council as a member of the Editorial Panel in the year 2014-2015 and had held various other positions as follows. In the year 2016-2017 Leo Mudith was the District Treasurer of Leo District 306A2 and a centennial coordinator for the Leo Multiple District 306. Later in 2017-2018 he was the Chief Administration Coordinator of Leo District 306A2. Furthermore, in the year 2018-2019 he acted as the Regional Director for region A of Leo District 306A2 and also as the Multiple District Assistant Secretary of Leo Multiple District 306. His journey in Leoism flourished and he was further able to be part of the organizing committees of several events within the Leo District and Leo Multiple District arena as follows

MultipleDistrictPresident.name: Leo Champaka Dammage
MultipleDistrictPresident.description:
Leo Champaka Dammage joined the Leo movement in 2008 as a member of his school Leo Club, Leo Club of Mahanama College which is where he was privileged to serve as the Director, Vice President, Secretary and the 30th club president of Leo club of Mahanama College for the Leoistic year 2013/2014. During his presidency, with his incredible leadership skills, Leo Club of Mahanama College was able to achieve more than 30 club and individual awards including the runners up award for the Most Outstanding Leo Club for the year 2013-2014 at the 9th Annual Leo District Conference and the most outstanding School Leo Club in Sri Lanka at the 36th Annual Multiple District Conference.

After leaving his alma mater he joined the Leo Club of Nawala Metro. During his 12 year tenure as a Leo, Leo Champaka has won many awards and recognition for his contribution to the Leo Movement including Lions Club International Leo Award of Honor, “Lions Young Leaders in Service Silver Award’ Certificate from The Lions international President, District Governor’s Appreciation, in 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, Lions Convention Top 10 Leo of the year, in 2014, 2015., Leo Multiple President’s Appreciation, in 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019., Most Outstanding Leo Club Vice President in Leo Multiple 306, in 2012, Most Outstanding Leo Club Secretary, Winner, in 2013., Most Outstanding Activity Director, Runner up, in 2013 and Most Outstanding Leo Club President, Runner Up, in 2014.

During his stay at Leo District 306C2, Leo Champaka was able to hold many prestigious positions in creating a better future for Leos around the island spectacularly. Leo Champaka was the Centennial District President of Leo District 306 C2, in 2016/2017. Furthermore, in the year 2018/19, he took the leadership in inaugurating the Mahendra Amarasuriya Leo Leadership Program, being the chairperson for the event.

Leo Champaka completed both primary and secondary education in Mahanama College, Colombo 03, not to mention, he was an outstanding Interactive student who engaged in many extracurricular activities. Leo Champaka Dammage is the eldest son of Mr. & Mrs. Dammage and he has one younger brother. Currently, he is working as a Software Engineer at DirectFN Technologies and Chief Technology Consultant at IIHRM.

districtChairman.name: Lion Anura Goonatillake
districtChairman.description:
Full Name:

Lion Anura Goonatilleke

Residence No.:

58/43B, 3rd Lane, Soma Thalagala Mawatha, Gangodawila, Nugegoda

Contact No.:

+94 77 384 75 74

Email:

lionanura@gmail.com

Education:

Highlands College, Nugegoda
Isipathana College, Colombo 5

Profession:
  • Managing Director, Fibretechno Traders, Nugegoda
  • Managing Director, Teliot Industries, Boralesgamuwa
  • Served as a Tour Guide Lecturer at Ceylon Tourist Board for 16 years
  • Served a Chief Coordinator at Mass Media & Information Ministry for 3 years
Lionistic Career:
  • A Charter Member of the Lions Club of Dampe Piliyandala in 2005 and served as board member
  • Club President of the Lions Club of Dampe Piliyandala for 6 months in 2008/2009
  • Joined Lions Club of Dampe as a transfer member and its Charter President in 2008/2009 and its Board Member since then
  • Continued as Club Presidency in 2009/2010
  • Founder of the Leo Club of Dampe in 2008/2009 and was its Advisor until its closure
  • Leo Advisor of the Leo Club of Godigamuwa from 2012/2013 to 2018/2019
  • District Chairman for Leos in consecutive 4 Leoistic years since 2017/2018
District Positions:
  • District Chairman for Leos in convective 4 Leoistic years since 2017/2018
  • DG’s Chief Program Coordinator in 2018/2019, 2019/2020 and 2020/2021
  • Chairman for Vision in 2019/2020 and 2020/2021
  • Chairman for International Photography Contest in 2019/2020 and 2020/2021
  • District Cabinet Officer since 2007
Achievements:
  • Most Outstanding Regional Coordinator 2008/2009
  • Most Outstanding Leo Advisor 2008/2009
  • Best Region Chairperson 2010/2011
  • Most Outstanding Chief Regional Coordinator 2012/2013
  • “TOP TEN” Lions recognition in 2014/2015, 2015/2016 and 2016/2017
  • Multiple District Award Winner for Lions International Environmental Photography Exhibition 2016/17
  • International President’s Certificates of Appreciation from 2008 to 2019
  • “Lion of the Year” at ‘Sahurda Pranama’- 13th Annual District Convention 2017/2018
  • Got 7 winner awards at Annual District Convention 2018/2019
  • Got 3 winner awards for vision, International photo contest & extension Leo clubs at Annual Multiple District Convention 2018/2019
Family:
  • Spouse Lion Devika is a member of the Lions Club of Dampe since 2007/2008 and was Past President 2017/2018 and a member of the District Ladies Committee since 2007/2008
  • Son, Channa Goonatilleke was a member of the Leo Club of Dampe for 7 years
  • Daughter-in-Law, Shashika, is the 1st Vice President of Lions Club of Dampe for the year 2020/2021, was an active member of the Leo Club of Dampe from 2008 and currently an active member of the Leo Club of Godigamuwa from 2015, a Leo Lion of the Lions Club of Dampe from 2017/2018
  • Daughter, Pavithra, was the Charter President of the Leo Club of Dampe and was an active Leo since 2008/2009
  • Son-in-Law, Dileepa Jayakody, is an active member of the Leo Club of Werahera
